bio:
Enmon, a Breton man, works as a miner and lives in Karthwasten mining settlement. He can often be found working the smelter, or in Sanuarach Mine to the north of the settlement.
Enmon is the husband of Mena and the father of Fjotra.
A midde-aged Breton man named Ainethach in the mayor of the mining settement.
The player will need to speak to Enmon, the father of Fjotra, to find the next Sybil of Dibella for the Temple in Markarth.
name: Enmon
